name: ACE COMBAT ASSAULT HORIZON LEGACY+ Update
formal_name: ACE COMBAT ASSAULT HORIZON LEGACY+ Update Ver. 2.1.0
description:
Added amiibo support.

Using the appropriate amiibo will unlock that amiibo’s aircraft and additional equipment (a cockpit item).
disclaimer: You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
